thread.section_title: LilySilk Bedding Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LilySilk Bedding Store | lilysilk.com
thread.title: Paul Morgan
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by Paul Morgan

author: Paul Morgan
title: Paul Morgan
text:
Anna at customer support helped with ensuring a custom tailored garment. She was thorough with follow up and made certain that I was comfortable.
The result was a perfect fitting, custom tailored garment that far exceeded my expectations. I couldn't be happier.
